name: process_constructions_slab

arguments.name: selectedliving
arguments.display_name: Of what space type is the living space

arguments.name: selectedslabperiext
arguments.display_name: Slab perimeter or exterior insulationFor manually entering slab perimeter or exterior insulation properties, leave blank

arguments.name: userdefinedslabperiextr
arguments.display_name: Slab perimeter insulation R-value or exterior insulation R-value

arguments.name: userdefinedslabperiextwidthdepth
arguments.display_name: Slab perimeter insulation width or exterior insulation depth

arguments.name: selectedslabgap
arguments.display_name: Perimeter or whole slab gapFor manually entering slab gap properties, leave blank

arguments.name: userdefinedslabgapr
arguments.display_name: Perimeter gap R-value or whole slab gap R-value

arguments.name: selectedcarpet
arguments.display_name: CarpetFor manually entering carpet properties, leave blank

modeler_description: Calculates material layer properties of slab constructions for the living space floor. Finds surfaces adjacent to the living space and sets applicable constructions.
description: This measure creates slab constructions for the living space floor.
